chapter.text: (Saad) Quran contains proof
Those disbelieve plunged into arrogance defiance
Multus generation them nos annihilated They alias pro help in vain
They wondered ut warner advenit them them. disbelievers dictus magician liar
he factus deus into 1 deus? Hoc est really peregrinus
Dux announced Iit steadfastly persevere worshipping tuus deus! Hoc est quod desired
Nos nunquam heard hoc religionis noster patris. Hoc est lie
Perfecit proof advenit eum nos? Indeed they est doubtful de My proof Indeed they non autem tasted My retribution
Perfecit they suus treasures mercy tuus Dominus Almighty Grantor
they possess sovereignty de caelum terra everything them? Let them help
Instead whatever forces they muster - Et si totus their parties manus unus - defeated
Disbelieving them est people Noah â€˜Aad mighty Pharaoh
(Alias Thamoud people Lot dwellers Silva Midyan;) those est opponents
Each de them disbelieved messengers sic My retribution est inevitable
These people expect single blow ex quae they nunquam recover
They challenged Noster Dominus perfecit vos non rush retribution nos Feria Reckoning
Est patient in the face de their utterances remember noster servus David resourceful; he est obedient
Nos committed montis his service glorifying eum nox feria
Alias birds committed serve eum; totus est obedient to eum
Nos strengthened his kingship endowed eum cum wisdom bonus logic
Vos received news de feuding vir habuit sneaked his sanctuary
When they iniit his room he startled They dictus non Habet fear Nos feuding 1 alias nos seeking tuus fair judgment Non wrong nos guide nos rectus path
Hoc frater de meus suus 90 9 sheep dum ego suus unus sheep He wants mix my sheep his continues pressure me

He dictus He est unfair to vos de asking combine tuus sheep his! Multus people combine their properties treat each alius unfairly those believe work righteousness these est few Afterwards David wondered si he factus rectus judgment He thought nos testing eum. He tunc implored his Dominus forgiveness bowed down repented
Nos forgave eum in hoc matter Nos granted eum position honor nos beautiful abode

O David nos factus vos ruler terra. Ergo vos scabinus among the people equitably non subsequentis tuus personal opinion lest it diverts vos via DEUS! Surely those stray via DEUS incur severe retribution forgetting Feria Reckoning
Nos non create caelum terra everything them in vain Such est the thinking de those disbelieve! Ergo woe to those disbelieve; they suffer Hell
Nos treat those believe lead righteous vita prout nos treat those commit malus terra? Nos treat righteous prout nos treat the wicked
Hoc est scripture nos sent down vos est sanctus - perhaps they reflect its verses Those possess intelligence take heed
To David nos granted Solomon; bonus obedient servus
feria he became preoccupied beautiful horses nox fell
He tunc dictus ego enjoyed material things multus than ego enjoyed worshipping my Dominus sun est iit
Bring them back bid farewell he rubbed their legs necks
Nos sic put Solomon test nos beatus eum vast material wealth he steadfastly submitted
He dictus My Dominus forgive me grant me kingship nunquam attained de anyone alias Vos est Grantor
Nos answered his prayer committed wind his disposal pouring rain wherever he wanted
devils building diving
Others locus his disposal
Hoc est noster provision vos; vos dedit generously withhold limits
He deserved prenobilis position nos wonderful abode
Remember noster servus Job he alias his Dominus devil afflicted me hardship pain
Strike ground tuus foot fons testimentum dedit vos healing drink
Nos restored his familia pro eum; twice prout multus. Such est noster mercy; reminder those possess intelligence
Statim vos travel terra preach message fulfill tuus pledge Nos invenit eum steadfast. Quod bonus servus! He est submitter
Remember alias noster servus Abraham Isaac Jacob. They est resourceful possessed vision
Nos bestowed them major beatus awareness Hereafter
They chosen they est among the multus righteous
Remember Ismail Elisha Zal-Kifl; among the multus righteous
Hoc est reminder righteous deserved wonderful destiny
gardens Eden testimentum open up their gates them
Relaxing therein they dedit multus generis de fruits drinks
They habet wonderful conjux
Hoc est quod vos deserved Feria Reckoning
Noster provisions est inexhaustible
Prout pro transgressors they incurred miserable destiny
Hell est ubi they burn quod miserable abode
quod they taste therein est hellish drinks bitter food
much multus de same generis
(Hoc est group thrown Hell vos. They non welcomed incola Hell). They deserved burn hellfire
newcomers respond Nor vos welcomed Vos est the unus proximus nos misled nos! Ergo suffer hoc miserable finis
They alias dictus Noster Dominus these est the unus led nos into hoc; double retribution hellfire them
(They dictus "Quam advenit nos non vide Hell) people nos perfecit used comes among the wicked
Nos used ridicule them; nos used turn noster eyes ex them
Hoc predetermined fact people Hell feud 1 alias
dictus ego warn vos; ibi non est alius deus DEUS 1 Supreme
Dominus de caelum terra everything them; Almighty the Forgiving
dictus Hic est awesome news
Ut vos est totally oblivious to
Ego non habet knowledge previously feud High Society
Ego inspired my sole mission est deliver warnings vos
Tuus Dominus dictus to angels ego creating human est clay
Dodum ego design eum blow eum ex My anima vos fall prostrate ante eum
angels fell prostrate totus de them
Satan; he refused est too arrogant unappreciative
He dictus O Satan quod prevented vos ex prostrating ante quod ego created My manus? Est vos too arrogant? Vos rebelled
He dictus ego est bene than he; Vos created me ex fire created eum ex clay
He dictus Ergo vos exulatus vos banished
Vos incurred My condemnation Feria Judgment
He dictus My Dominus respite me Feria Resurrection
He dictus Vos respited
Dum appointed feria
He dictus ego juravit Tuus majesty ego send them totus astray
Tuus worshipers qui devoted absolutely Vos alone
He dictus Hoc est truth truth est totus ego utter
Ego fill Hell vos totus those subsequentis vos
dictus ego non ask vos any wage ego non est impostor
Hoc est reminder saeculum
Vos testimentum certainly invenit out in awhile
